subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Marist does not have the credentials to get an at-large bid, which means the only way it can get to the N.C.A.A. tournament is to win its conference tournament.
snippet: Marist does not have the credentials to get an at-large bid, which means the only way it can get to the N.C.A.A. tournament is to win its conference tournament.
